    • Invitation

      public Invitation(String title, String body, int notificationId, int recipient, int sender, int eventId)
      Constructor for the Invitation class
      Parameters:
      title - Title of the notification
      body - Body text of the notification
      notificationId - ID of the notification
      recipient - ID of the recipient entrant
      sender - ID of the sender entrant
      eventId - ID of the event associated with the invitation

  • Method Details

    • onAccept

      public void onAccept(EventCallback callback)
      Handles the acceptance of the invitation by the recipient Removes the entrant from the event waitlist and adds them to the event

    • onDecline

      public void onDecline(EventCallback callback)
      Handles the decline of the invitation by the recipient Removes the entrant from the event waitlist

      Getter for whether the invitation has been accepted
